title: High Greenhouse Gas Emissions Per Capita
description: In 2023, Palau recorded a total greenhouse gas emission of 84.71 t CO2e per capita, one of the highest globally.

title: Significant Carbon Dioxide Emissions Per Capita
description: Palau's carbon dioxide emissions per capita reached 81.21 t CO2e in 2023, placing it among the top emitters worldwide.

title: High Carbon Intensity of GDP
description: In 2023, Palau's carbon intensity of GDP was 6.56 kg CO2e per constant 2015 US$ of GDP, indicating a high environmental impact relative to economic output.

title: Carbon Intensity in PPP Terms
description: With a carbon intensity of 5.14 kg CO2e per 2021 PPP $ of GDP in 2023, Palau's economy shows significant carbon emissions relative to purchasing power.

title: Tourism Dominates Export Revenue
description: In 2017, international tourism receipts accounted for 93.52% of Palau's total exports, highlighting the country's heavy reliance on tourism.

title: Significant Reduction in Methane Emissions
description: Palau achieved a remarkable 77.44% reduction in methane emissions from 1990 levels by 2023, showcasing its commitment to environmental sustainability.

title: Low Unemployment Among Educated Females
description: In 2020, only 0.42% of Palau's female labor force with advanced education was unemployed, reflecting strong employment opportunities for educated women.

title: High Current Account Deficit
description: In 2022, Palau's current account balance was -52.99% of GDP, indicating a significant deficit and reliance on external financing.

title: Minimal Nitrous Oxide Emissions from Waste
description: Palau's nitrous oxide emissions from waste were negligible at 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023, highlighting its effective waste management practices.

title: Dependence on UN Agency Flows
description: In 2022, Palau received $20,012 from UN agencies, indicating some level of dependence on international aid for development.

title: Limited Merchandise Exports
description: Palau's merchandise exports were valued at $2 million in 2023, reflecting a small export sector.

title: Stable Government Expenditure
description: In 2022, Palau's general government final consumption expenditure was $92.89 million, indicating stable public spending.

title: Strong Focus on Primary Education
description: With 1,401 pupils enrolled in primary education in 2023, Palau demonstrates a commitment to foundational education.
